Detailed Description

template<class CHAR_T = char, CHAR_T * ALPHABET = a2z, uint32_t ALPHABET_SIZE = a2z_size>
class AlphabetNode< CHAR_T, ALPHABET, ALPHABET_SIZE >

B-tire has two types of node, alphabet node and bucket. This is for laphabet node.
